page_title: Welcome to the Movie Tracking Site!
about_service:
Here you can search for movies, series, and people and add them to your list of favorites.

In the list of favorites you can choose the status for each movie, add a link to the site for viewing and a note about the movie or series.

For TV series you can choose the series and season you're on.

info.telegram_for_communication_and_discussio: Telegram for communication and discussion of films
